Title: PD:
Text: Jan 1

Title: Blood Type
Text: AB

Title: Story I
Text: The person in charge of the WGAA and a member of the Babylonia Council. He is responsible for managing the arts development in Babylonia.

Title: Story II
Text: Allen is a friendly, easy-going gentleman, yet due to his [Data Erased] background, many people cannot help but show their reverence when they are talking to him.

Title: Story III
Text: Allen is obsessed with all forms of art. Even an artwork that was regarded as heterodox in the Golden Age is still a valuable piece of treasure in his eyes.

Title: PD:
Text: Nov 29

Title: Blood Type
Text: O

Title: Story I
Text: Born an aristocrat, Aston is an influential figure in the aristocratic circles on Asslam and Jamilah's right-hand man.

Title: Story II
Text: Aston's family has been serving the royal family for generations. He has taken over his father's duties since the third leader of Akdilek ascended to power.

Title: Story III
Text: Aston has already acknowledged Jamilah for her unlimited potential when she was still a child.

Title: PD:
Text: Feb 29

Title: Blood Type
Text: B

Title: Story I
Text: The person in charge of the Science Council and a member of the Babylonia Council. He is responsible for handling the scientific and technical affairs in Babylonia.

Title: Story II
Text: Asimov has completely thrown himself into scientific research and already made several huge achievements at a young age, yet his lack of social skills makes him a despicable man for many people.

Title: Story III
Text: To Asimov, scientific development is always his top priority when making a decision, even if the decision makes him look somewhat ruthless. Having said that, he does not pay his image any mind, for it has nothing to do with science.

Title: PD:
Text: Jul 1

Title: Blood Type
Text: O

Title: Story I
Text: A member of the Oasis Squad stationed in Kuzath Snow Plains. After Oasis Squad's instructor, ■■, sacrificed his life, Bruce was ordered to temporarily take over the leadership, leading the squad for a rescue mission in Kuzath Snow Plains.

Title: Story II
Text: Watanabe's closest friend. Bruce's dream was to join the Ground Forces, so that he could save people from dying on the frontlines.

Title: Story III
Text: Bruce and Watanabe were the top two trainee soldiers in their squad. The reason why Watanabe achieved this great performance was that he often got extra lessons for his misbehaviors.

Title: Story IV
Text: Bruce's harmonica and Watanabe's guitar show was a real hit in the Oasis Squad.

Title: PD:
Text: Mar 20

Title: Blood Type
Text: A

Title: Story
Text: The leader of the Support Force, yet her power is comparable with that of the Task Force soldiers.

Title: PD:
Text: Apr 7

Title: Blood Type
Text: A

Title: Story
Text: Born on the Nighter, he has become one of the bodyguards on Asslam for various reasons.

Title: PD:
Text: Sep 5

Title: Blood Type
Text: B

Title: Story
Text: A member of the Kowloong Crew on the Nighter, Chaofeng is a recon and espionage specialist responsible for data collection and monitoring.

Title: PD:
Text: Oct 18

Title: Blood Type
Text: B

Title: Story
Text: An aristocrat on Asslam and the leader of the opposition faction against Jamilah's leadership. He once incited Sophia to kill Jamilah, yet his scheme came to naught in the end.

Title: PD:
Text: May 1

Title: Story I
Text: The spiritual leader of Babylonia and the president of the Babylonia Council. He is responsible for Babylonia's overall management.

Title: Story V
Text: In order to bring Babylonia back to the Earth, he has been dedicating himself to striking a balance among different Humanity Fronts.

Title: PD:
Text: Jun 12

Title: Blood Type
Text: A

Title: Story I
Text: A resident of the Murmansk Port.

Title: Story II
Text: Once saved by Rosetta, he is acquainted with the world of the Forest Guard and has become their loyal friend.

Title: PD:
Text: Nov 1

Title: Blood Type
Text: O

Title: Story
Text: A human-deer hybrid Construct with a pair of distinctive antler-shaped structures on her head. When Rosetta left the boreal forest, she, as a member of the Forest Guard, has taken over her role temporarily.

Title: PD:
Text: Oct 3

Title: Blood Type
Text: AB

Title: Story I
Text: The fourth leader of the Akdilek Commercial Alliance. She has consolidated her power as the first female leader by weakening the traditional aristocrats' influence on Asslam.

Title: Story II
Text: Almost everything in life is but a trade-off to her: no eternal enemies, only eternal interests.

Title: PD:
Text: Jun 28

Title: Blood Type
Text: A

Title: Story I
Text: The instructor of the Oasis Squad stationed in Kuzath Snow Plains who has trained numerous valiant soldiers. He executed a certain mission with Nikola and Hassen at a young age.

Title: Story II
Text: He sacrificed his life to save the civilians when the virus broke out, but his body has not been found until today.

Title: PD:
Text: Jan 18

Title: Blood Type
Text: O

Title: Story I
Text: One of the largest contributors to the Construct Tech. Kalon has greatly improved the chance of a successful Construct modification experiment, though the price for it has become his unforgettable trauma.

Title: Story II
Text: Unable to stand the Construct modification experiment anymore, Kalon left the research team and hid out in the slum of City 052. He adopted a helpless girl named Karenina there.

Title: PD:
Text: Oct 23

Title: Blood Type
Text: O

Title: Story
Text: A military Construct from the same batch as Kamui. He is somewhat timid, but he is willing to support his comrades with everything he has got on the battlefield.

Title: PD:
Text: Jul 10

Title: Blood Type
Text: B

Title: Story
Text: He is an officer of Babylonia and the head of the Smith family.

Title: PD:
Text: Jul 7

Title: Blood Type
Text: A

Title: Story
Text: Dominik's friend. After Dominik went missing, she started to research possible methods of suppressing the Punishing Virus, and, by conducting numerous human experiments, the gigantic Golden Vortex is her answer for that.

Title: PD:
Text: May 1

Title: Blood Type
Text: B

Title: Story I
Text: The commander-in-chief of Babylonia and a member of the Babylonia Council. Nikola is responsible for handling the military affairs in Babylonia.

Title: Story V
Text: In order to reclaim the Earth, Nikola will do everything he needs to do.

Title: PD:
Text: Aug 15

Title: Blood Type
Text: B

Title: Story I
Text: A member of the Kowloong Crew on the Nighter, Pulao is a security specialist responsible for the security affairs of the Kowloong Chamber of Commerce.

Title: Story II
Text: Unlike the rest of the Kowloong Crew, Pulao seems to have retained part of her memory.

Title: PD:
Text: May 26

Title: Blood Type
Text: A

Title: Story
Text: A scavenger living in an underground tunnel of City 049.

Title: PD:
Text: Sep 2

Title: Blood Type
Text: AB

Title: Story I
Text: The Sky Lord Celica. Everything seems to be a breeze to this impeccable, gorgeous secretary.

Title: Story II
Text: [This log has been edited abnormally. Please contact the relevant personnel as soon as possible.]

Title: Blood Type
Text: O

Title: Story I
Text: An Archaeological Team member from the World Government Association of Art. Her beautiful voice and superb opera singing techniques mark her off from the other opera singers.

Title: Story II
Text: A gentle, considerate girl who always lends a hand to people in need.

Title: PD:
Text: Feb 1

Title: Blood Type
Text: AB

Title: Story I
Text: A pious priest of a church located in the north of Kuzath Snow Plains. He embraced everyone with infinite compassion.

Title: Story II
Text: In fact, he is a bionic robot hastily activated by the churches in the Golden Age, the time when religion lost its appeal.

Title: PD:
Text: Dec 10

Title: Blood Type
Text: O

Title: Story I
Text: A military volunteer of City 173. Even though he was just a military volunteer, when it came to protecting his city, he acted even more valiantly than the real soldiers did.

Title: Story II
Text: His kindness always brings sunshine to the people around him.

Title: Story III
Text: Toby was abducted by Daedalus for an illegal Construct modification experiment soon after he came in contact with Bianca. He managed to escape halfway through the experiment.

Title: Story IV
Text: Only after Bianca left the church did the folks discover the symptoms of corruption on Toby's body. Nonetheless, the fact that Toby was corrupted before death did not lessen their hatred and fear of Bianca. They blamed her for everything that had ever happened.

Title: Story V
Text: His body is buried in the cemetery of City 173.

Title: PD:
Text: Sep 1

Title: Blood Type
Text: B

Title: Story I
Text: The chairman of Daedalus and a former Kurono's employee. With an opposite view on how to treat the Constructs, Wen left Babylonia and founded Daedalus by leveraging his extensive social network.

Title: Story II
Text: He is a perfectionist who has a special affection for a perfect piece of work. As for the defectives, he shows no mercy, and almost everything in this world seems defective to him.

Title: PD:
Text: Jun 13

Title: Blood Type
Text: A

Title: Story I
Text: The captain of the 25-633th squadron. Known as the "Beak of Islay", the flying ace of the World Government, Cyril has made outstanding contributions on the battlefield.

Title: Story II
Text: In the 5th Operation Acadia, Cyril was seen around the operation location, yet his name was not on the list of servicemen for that operation.

Title: PD:
Text: Jan 5

Title: Blood Type
Text: AB

Title: Story
Text: A staff member of the Center of Basic Public Education in Babylonia.

Title: PD:
Text: Oct 8

Title: Blood Type
Text: A

Title: Story I
Text: A member of the Kowloong Crew on the Nighter and Villier's bodyguard. Yazi is responsible for handling black ops missions.

Title: Story II
Text: Unlike the rest of the Kowloong Crew, Yazi seems to have retained part of her memory.

Title: PD:
Text: Apr 21

Title: Blood Type
Text: B

Title: Story
Text: Lee's younger brother, Nikola's agent, and a new tactician in the Combat Department. In order to achieve his ambitions, Babylonia, Ascendants, and all the other things in this world are nothing but pawns to Murray.

Title: PD:
Text: Unknown

Title: Blood Type
Text: O

Title: Story
Text: Publicly executed by Luna for attempting to lay hands on a secret she deemed to be forbidden. He may also be linked to other Ascendants that you have yet to meet...

Title: Story
Text: Camu's instructor in Kurono. A member of the Special Security Department, and an experienced warrior. Killed by the furious Camu.

Title: Story
Text: A Construct of Babylonia. Her real intention was to control Amberia and take revenge on the ARU. For this purpose she was willing to pay any price, including asking Ascendants for help and protection.

Title: Story
Text: A Commandant of Babylonia. Once served as the direct leader of Atiel, and was later betrayed by her.

Title: Story
Text: The Chief Captain of the Arctic Route Union.

Title: Story
Text: An bear-model bionic. Joined Nanami to stop the war between bionics and humans.

Title: Story
Text: A member of the Forest Guards. Protected Pfaff and Rosetta in the snow.

Title: Story I
Text: Rosetta's grandfather. Never allowed her to display a single sign of weakness.

Title: Story II
Text: Decided to hunt the Narwhal alone without Rosetta for a chance to atone for their guilt.
